sentences.sContent: Wordsworth was one of the greatest lyric poets of his time.
sentences.sCn: 华兹华斯是他那个时代最伟大的抒情诗人之一。

words.tran: 抒情诗调的；感情丰富的；充满愉悦的
抒情性；抒情诗体；抒情方式抒情
抒情诗人；（流行歌曲等的）歌词作者
弹七弦琴的人；抒情诗人

trans.tranOther: expressing strong personal emotions such as love, in a way that is similar to music in its sounds and  rhythm
